GeneralControl.Property: Options: File and FileAndFolder. File allows for browsing in the current folder. FileAndFolder allows for browsing in the current folder and subfolders.
Applies custom Setter, Getter, Requester if set.
User defined list values.
Description of the control.
Options: Web or Local. Web uses the virtual IIS folder. Local uses the local file folder on the web server.
Path to use when the File Browse control is initially opened.
Options: True or False. If set to True, only modeling objects that are valid for Exporting will be displayed. If set to False, all modeling objects will be displayed.
Sets a reference to the Document CDO that is viewed within the control. This property retrieves a document instance from elements such as a DataContract or a control on the page.
Specifies the name of the JT file (without an extension) that is rendered by the control. The JT file must be uploaded to the CamstarUploads/Models folder.
Mask that can be used to optionally filter file types. Examples: "*.*", "*.rpt", "*.txt"

Options: FileName or FullPath. FileName expects only the name of the file to be used. FullPath is dependent on the DirectoryMode - Local will use the local server path plus the file name, and Web will use the IIS path plus the file name.
Name of the radio button group.
Name of the control.
Indicates order of precedence when using the tab key.
Tooltip text to display when hovering the mouse over the control. This will supersede the ToolTipLabel.
Name of the Dictionary label for the tool tip. This will be displayed when hovering the mouse over the control.
Type of the control - Read only.
Collection of web properties for the control.
Will be deprecated in an upcoming release.
A collection of tag names and either their control ID or session variable.
Sets the allowed lower limit for weight when using a scale control.
Sets the allowed upper limit for weight when using a scale control.
Sets the ideal target weight when using a scale control.
Passes and sets a minimum value on the scale control. If nothing is passed in it will either default to 0 or be set to the TargetMinimum value if it is less than 0.
Passes and sets a maximum value on the scale control. If nothing is passed in, the ScaleMax will be calculated based on the TargetMaximum value.
Customize the page display by making it full screen or by hiding various components of the page such as the header, the footer, the top menu, and/or the tabs.
Web part that appears in the Web Part Container control.
Allows the control to be edited if property is set to True. Otherwise, control is read only.
Adds/Subtracts a specified time interval. For example: Now-1 day.
Can text be entered manually? Options:True,False.
Populate the field automatically if there is only one value in the control.
Forces the control to post back when the data changes.
Clear values when control is disabled.
Not in use. Options: True, False.
Allows for specification of a handler from an event on the browser side.
Allows for setting data to a property based on condition result from an event on browser side.
Allows for a customized confirmation pop-up to appear when the button/action is pressed. The user can accept to continue with the submit action or cancel to stop the submit action.
Custom string representation format of date value (e.g. MM/dd/yy).
Expandable section for configuring button action.
Select or upload image to use for button.
Default state of the control. Options: Collapsed, Expanded.
Disables auto filtering of list data when a value is entered in the field. When disabled, filtering the list will only occur when the refresh button is pressed.
Disable clearing the field value on a clear action like ClearValues or ClearOnSubmit.
Displays opened panel only when set.
Allows for specification of a handler from an event.
Options: True or False. Allows the Instruction Text control to expand to display the full amount of it's contents.
Deprecated.

AdHocQuery – Query is stored directly in the virtual page. Inherited from DataTable. Allows dynamic query text in runtime. PredefienedQuery – References a Designer or User query. Inherited from DataTable. Allows dynamic query name in runtime. SelectionValues – Inherited from DataTable. Works in a bound mode. Loads data by the selection values request. Supports submitting data built from selected rows. Can use 2 field expressions – one for data loading and for submitting. SubEntityList – Inherited from ItemList. Supports a particular bound mode for item type derived from the SubEntity class. ItemList – Supports any typed array as data source. Can be bound to FieldExpression and uses regular value loading from the Camstar server. Also it can work in unbound mode i.e. without field expression. In unbound mode the ItemType must be defined and loading and submitting data should be implemented in code. Paging with Camstar server is not allowed. Generic – Mode for generic grid accepting any non-structural data source in DataTable or RecordSet. Mostly it can be used for manual programming from code behind.
Options: True or False. If True, the control or web part will render in the HTML but not be visible to the user. For example, display "none" in the HTML tag.
Collection of alternate images and conditions for when to apply them.
Is this button a "Primary" button? Options: True, False.
Options: True, False - Displays date/time mask in the editable area of the control if set to true.
Maximum number of characters allowed to be entered.
Maximum width of control in pixels.
Adds additional text below the Radio Button control.
Label text to display below the Radio Button control.
Options: True or False. If True, the modeling object list will reuse the same tab when opening a new object.
Field is required at the Pageflow level rather than the page level. The validation is enforced upon pageflow submission.
Allows definition of a control's property value as a result of an evaluated expression (condition). The property is evaluated at Page execution run-time.
Query string parameters for a URL opened in Iframe.
How revision is displayed. Options: Standard, Revision, ROR.
If true, data of the control cannot be modified and will not be submitted.
Condition that triggers the Performance Indicator metric to refresh.
Control is required? Options: True, False.
SetDataValueItem collection for Revision.
An expression which identifies a field to get Revision value from.
Expandable group containing collection of Dynamic Web Parts, Layout, Name, and Type Name of Section.
Options: True or False. Indicates whether users may select only leaf nodes or any nodes.
Grid Settings Editor.
Show date without timestamp. Options: True, False.
Options: True, False. Shows a label to the user that indicates the Duration format.
Smart Scan type name that matches value in Settings.xml to enable smart scanning of field.
Allows for specification of a different field expression for the specstep and specstepchanges on the control in the case of the object using subclassed values instead of the default values.
Is field capable of being a sticky field? Options: True, False.
Is field sticky by default? Options: True, False.
Specifies subentity's parent value source(s).
If specified then clicking Enter button on the control will trigger Submit event.
Allows for specification of a different field expression for the SubWorkflow and SubWorkflowChanges on the control in the case of the object using subclassed values instead of the default values.
Options: True or False. Indicates whether clicking on the radio button's text will toggle the radio button's selected value.
Text input masking. Options: None, Integer, Decimal, Formatted.
Text input Mode. Options: Single Line, MultiLine, Password.
Options: NamedSubentity, Subentity.
URL for the Iframe page.
Options: NamedSubentity, Subentity - Specifies entered data type.
Validate entries made by manual text entry against selection values. Options: True, False.
Options: Name, ID - Identifies output data by Name of ID respectively.
SetDataValueItem collection for Workflow.
Allows for specification of maintenance service type used in case of subclass or different primary service type. Defaults to "WorkflowMaint" if no value is specified for this property.
Specifies how often the Duration control refreshes in seconds. Set to 5 seconds by default.
Dictionary label that appears as the label text for a Section Drop Down control when closed.
Label text for a Section Drop Down control when closed. Overrides the AltCloseLabelName dictionary label when both are specified.
Dictionary label that appears as the label text for a Section Drop Down control when open.
Label text for a Section Drop Down control when open. Overrides the AltOpenLabelName dictionary label when both are specified.
In a MultiField mode specifies common part of each radio button item.
Controls the display mode of the Boolean Switch control. Options: RadioButton or Slide.
Indicates the method by which the chart will display in runtime.
Label used to display additional context about the PI Metric.
Label text used to display additional context about the PI Metric.
The data source for the Crystal Report. This is set in the Intelligence Setting portal property.
Determines how the list of selection options will be displayed.

Text to display when selector is collapsed. Supercedes label name.
Options: True or False. Indicates whether the toolbar will be displayed when the Report Control renders.
If false, data of the control cannot be edited in the browser but may still be submitted.
Label used on Boolean Dropdown control to represent a False value.
Options: True or False. Enables dirty flag functionality on page tabs to indicate if a value on the page tab has changed.
Setting that controls drill down tabs within Crystal Reports. Refer to your Crystal Reports documentation for information.
Setting that controls the Group Tree button within Crystal Reports. Refer to your Crystal Reports documentation for information.

Options: True or False. Allows the object to be resized.

Sets the color of the zone between the Target Maximum Weight and the Scale Maximum. Defaults to red. Note: this is only applicable if the Target Maximum Weight has been specified.

Sets the color of the zone between the Target Minimum Weight and the Target Maximum Weight. Defaults to green. NOTE: if no Target Minimum or Target Maximum Weights are set, the zone will be between the Scale Min and Scale Max.
Sets the color of the zone between the Scale Minimum and the Target Minimum Weight. Defaults to yellow. Note: this is only applicable if a Target Minimum Weight has been specified.
Control is visible? Options: True, False.
Label used on the Boolean Switch control for the Yes value when the control is in the Slide display mode.
Label text used on the Boolean Switch control for the Yes value when the control is in the Slide display mode.
The report is zoomed in upon opening to this factor. Defaults to value specified in the Crystal Reports template.
Renders control content when collapsed, expands and collapses content without postback when set to True.
Sets the Toggle Container control to appear as a collapsible section.

The text value for the Actual Weight – this will override what is written in the ActualWeightLabelName.
The unit of measure that is associated with the Actual Weight.
This either displays or hides the following scale settings: Scale Min, Target Minimum Weight, Target Maximum Weight, Scale Max.
The percentage prior to reaching the TargetMinimumWeight where the Scale control will zoom in. The Percentage must be between 0 and 100. Set to 10% by default.
If set to true, the legend will be displayed; if false, the legend will be hidden.

PageflowContent.Property: Creation date and time of the component.
Time period since creation of the pageflow.
Last modified date of the component.
User whom odified the componentmost recently.
Code behind type of the pageflow.
Sets the page as the start page in the pageflow when set to True. Note: Only one page can be set as the start page within a single pageflow.
Location of the page node within the pageflow diagram when viewing a pageflow in the working area. This property uses an "x,y" format when setting the location of a page node.
Selects a label as the description beneath the page title on the tabs of the pageflow. Refer to "Searching for Page Action Labels" for information on using the Label Lookup pop-up.

Text that appears as the description beneath the page title on the tabs of the pageflow. Text entered here takes priority over the PageDescriptionLabelName property when both text is entered and a labelis selected.
Selects a label as the title of the page on the tabs of the pageflow. Refer to "Searching for Page Action Labels" for information on using the Label Lookup pop-up.
Text that appears as the title of the page on the tabs of the pageflow. Text entered here takes priority over the PageTitleLabelName property when both text is entered and a label is selected.
